Author: zerkalisz
Title: HireGo - Decentralized Car Hire
Body: Blockchain Peer to Peer Car insurance  HireGo is reinventing Car sharing using Blockchain and smart contracts. We are diminishing the role of middle men and other monopolising intermediaries giving control and profits back to the users.  Users such as private individuals or businesses can list their cars on the HireGo marketplace. Users can custom search and select cars to be hired by the hour, mile or day.  Insurance is possibly the first thing to come to mind when thinking of using a car. Blockchain is disrupting the insurance industry thanks to peer to peer insurance.  Peer to peer insuarance is based on a community of trusted members who are rewarded for good behaviour and practices using tokens. This community can vouch for one another, giving guarantees of users’ reliability.  By encouraging a robust and vibrant car sharing community, also with the use of token incentives, HireGo users will have access to significantly discounted insurance rates when compared to traditional insurance. This saving could be up to 80% compared with traditional insurance.  The insurance option will be available within the HireGo app so users can access cars seamlessly.  This saving together with zero commission charged to the car owner will encourage users to list cars on the HireGo platform, creating the worlds largest car share vehicle market place.  HireGo is leading the transition to decentralised car sharing, the future of mobility. https://medium.com/hirego-carsharing/hirego-and-blockchain-peer-to-peer-car-insurance-56a92929b970

Author: Hire_Go
Title: HireGo - Decentralized Car Hire
Body: Hello all, thank you for your comments and questions.  There are still 19 days to participate in the presale. There will be no discount in the main sale so take advantage of the 35% bonus!  The demo DApp can be tried here; http://demo.hirego.io/. Currently there are options to hire and list vehicles. We are adding necessary functionalities ready for the beta version in Q3.  The project is progressing well, we are focused on completing our milestones.  Questions on dispute resolution in the event of an incident are valid. This is a key priority for our Team. We are negotiating a partnership agreement with a well known Blockchain based peer to peer insurance company. This will also drastically reduce insurance costs compared to conventional insurance services.  In addition to the almost zero fee listing this will make HireGo the most attractive platform to list vehicles paving the way for the worlds largest car sharing marketplace.  Some recent key announcements can be found on our Medium publication including;  Hacken partnership; https://blog.hacken.io/freaking-out-about-the-issues-of-car-sharing-consider-the-power-of-transparency-c624269084a4  Mobiq group industry partnership; https://medium.com/hirego-carsharing/hirego-and-mobiq-group-industry-partnership-announcement-5c60f3a97f00  Founding member of Bee Token Ali Ayyash joins HireGo; https://medium.com/hirego-carsharing/welcome-ali-ayyash-founding-member-bee-token-bf4fbbc363e4  PhD researcher and sharing economy expert Esther Martos joins HireGo; https://medium.com/hirego-carsharing/unlocking-mobility-through-the-blockchain-66a3a98e4e3f  Thank you for your participation, see https://www.hirego.io/ for more including presale registration.  Join our Telegram; https://t.me/hirego  Feel free to email us contact@hirego.io  Be a part of the decentralised car sharing revolution!

Author: Hire_Go
Title: HireGo - Decentralized Car Hire
Body: https://hirego.io/assets/img/logo-icon.png http://www.hirego.io   HireGo is UK based company building a decentralised car hire and car sharing app   HireGo peer to peer car hire and car share aims to disrupt the $90billion car hire industry by providing a safe, user-orientated decentralised platform.  HireGo has an experienced and skilled UK based team and is supported by expert blockchain and smart contract advisors.     Website Telegram Twitter LinkedIn    Token Symbol: HGO Total supply: 100m Type: ERC20   Join our telegram and send us a PM to register as a beta tester for our upcoming Android and iOS apps. We're also looking to grow our community, so if you find our project of interest please join our Telegram channel and community chat group on Telegram or feel free to email us at contact@hirego.io
